scenes.background: You agreed to prioritize the urgent task but asked for help to ensure nothing else falls behind. As you juggle the tasks, [Monica] walks over to your desk and says, 'Hey, I see you're really busy. Can I take over some of your other tasks to help out?'
scenes.description: 'Hey, I see you're really busy. Can I take over some of your other tasks to help out?'

options.text: Sure, that would be great. Let me show you what needs to be done.
options.analysis: You accepted the help and delegated tasks, showing good emotional control and motivation. However, you might lack empathy by not considering Monica's workload.

options.text: I really appreciate the offer, but I think I can manage for now.
options.analysis: You acknowledged Monica's offer but chose to manage on your own, showing good emotional perception and empathy. However, interpersonal balance could be better as Monica might feel her help is not valued.

options.text: Thanks, but I think it's best if I handle these myself. Maybe you can check back later?
options.analysis: You chose to decline the help but left the door open for future assistance, showing good social skills and emotional balance. However, motivation and self-regulation might be higher.
